items: Learn why Python is useful and where it is used
Become familiar with basic programming terms (programming language, syntax)

sections.heading: What is Python?
paragraphs: Python is a programming language — a way to give instructions to a computer.
It’s popular because it’s easy to read, powerful, and flexible.
bullets: Easy to read (syntax is similar to English)
Powerful (used in many companies and industries)

sections.heading: What Can You Do with Python?
Key Terms
rows: Rules for how you write code (like grammar)
Tool that reads and runs your Python code

sections.text: Python was named after Monty Python, not the snake.

bullets: Python is a beginner-friendly programming language.
It is used for websites, apps, data science, automation, and more.
Learning Python is a great first step into the world of coding!
